title: Real estate activities (PKD 68)
paragraphs: Activity connected with using and managing real estate necessary for transport and logistics.
Possibility to buy, rent or manage properties such as parking areas, small warehouses or offices.
Real estate activities are auxiliary and support the long-term development of the transport business.
points: Managing office and correspondence address of the company.
Searching and negotiating locations for parking, depots or small logistics bases.
Cooperation with real estate owners along the companyâ€™s main transport routes.
